rows.label: qst700701_msg0001
rows.name:
Oof, that stings...
Did you seriously need to punch me?!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0002
rows.name:
Shut your mouth, boy! Can't you see
how much you put everyone out?!
A thrashing is exactly what you need!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0003
rows.name:
What was I supposed to do?!
I got attacked by monsters! I'm not
prepared for something like that!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0004
rows.name:
And anyway, all this because a bit of
gardening gets pushed back by a day?
It's way out of proportion!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0005
rows.name:
"Bit of"... "Bit of gardening"?
I'll show you a bit of gardening, you...!!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0006
rows.name: Mr. Nittle, control yourself!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0007
rows.name: This is getting out of hand!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0008
rows.name:
Fool! You think it's just some garden?
This is the royal garden of the King of
Iira we're talking about!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0009
rows.name: I know all that!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0010
rows.name: Oh, you do, do you?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0011
rows.name:
The state of this garden will remind our
liege of the disarray his land is in after
the war... And you're fine with that?!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0012
rows.name:
What if someone comes forward, says
our king can't even keep his garden
in good condition...?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0013
rows.name:
If it reaches his royal ears, his brilliance
may dim, and that may impact his rule.
Down that path lies chaos and misery!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0014
rows.name:
...Dad. Come on.
It's just a garden...

rows.label: qst700701_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm telling you, it's more than that!
You'd better learn to listen, boy!
There is more at stake than you know.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0016
rows.name:
Wow...
I guess you're a big deal, huh, Pops?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0017
rows.name: Even though I don't get it.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0018
rows.name:
Still talking back? You must really
miss the taste of my knuckles.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0019
rows.name:
That's not what I mean! I might not
100% understand, but I'm open to the
possibility that you're right!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0020
rows.name:
I don't know if what you say is true,
but I guess it might be. So I guess I'll
keep helping you with your work.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0021
rows.name:
Is that right...? Well...
That's very nice of you to say...

rows.label: qst700701_msg0022
rows.name:
But you'll have to give me something
as well! Like words of encouragement!
Some coaching or whatever!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0023
rows.name:
'Cause I tell ya, I've had enough tastes
of your fist to last me several lifetimes!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0024
rows.name:
Hrmph! If I wanted your opinions on
how to raise a son, I'd have asked you!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0025
rows.name:
I'm so happy they've finally reached
an understanding.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0026
rows.name:
Kasumi?
How is that an understanding?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0027
rows.name:
Just look at how happy and content
they look. Doesn't that speak volumes?

rows.label: qst700701_msg0028
rows.name:
In any case, I'm glad the gardens have
finally been put in order.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0029
rows.name:
Thank you, everyone! At last, I can
bring His Majesty some good news.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0030
rows.name:
That is a positive outcome.
Now, if there is anything else we can...

rows.label: qst700701_msg0031
rows.name:
S-surely you jest, Lord Hugo!
My heart could not withstand any more
second-hand embarrassment!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0032
rows.name: Ahahahah!

rows.label: qst700701_msg0033
rows.name:
May God grant you a long life
and good fortune, Mr. Nittle.

rows.label: qst700701_msg0034
rows.name:
Mmmgh... Yes...
That would be nice, wouldn't it?
